title_teim: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Broadcast, parts 1-4.
title_ssm: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Broadcast, parts 1-4.
title_si: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Broadcast, parts 1-4.
label_teim: 16th Annual Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony Tape 1 of 2 (Segments 1-4) Air Date: 3/21/01
label_ssm: 16th Annual Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony Tape 1 of 2 (Segments 1-4) Air Date: 3/21/01
summary_teim: Queen, Steely Dan, James Burton, Johnnie Johnson, Ritchie Valens, Michael Jackson, and Aerosmith are inducted in the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Queen, Steely Dan, Ricky Martin, and Aerosmith.
summary_ssm: Queen, Steely Dan, James Burton, Johnnie Johnson, Ritchie Valens, Michael Jackson, and Aerosmith are inducted in the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Queen, Steely Dan, Ricky Martin, and Aerosmith.
contents_teim: We will rock you (Queen) -- Jann Wenner introduces Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins -- Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins induct Queen -- Queen accept their award -- Tie your mother down (Queen with Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins) -- Moby inducts Steely Dan -- Steely Dan accept their award -- Do it again (Steely Dan) -- Keith Richards inducts James Burton and Johnnie Johnson -- James Burton accepts his award -- Johnnie Johnson accepts his award -- Come on let's go, Donna, and La Bamba (Ricky Martin) -- *NSYNC inducts Michael Jackson -- Michael Jackson accepts his award -- Kid Rock inducts Aerosmith -- Aerosmith accept their award -- Sweet emotion (Aerosmith with Kid Rock).
contents_ssm: We will rock you (Queen) -- Jann Wenner introduces Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins -- Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins induct Queen -- Queen accept their award -- Tie your mother down (Queen with Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins) -- Moby inducts Steely Dan -- Steely Dan accept their award -- Do it again (Steely Dan) -- Keith Richards inducts James Burton and Johnnie Johnson -- James Burton accepts his award -- Johnnie Johnson accepts his award -- Come on let's go, Donna, and La Bamba (Ricky Martin) -- *NSYNC inducts Michael Jackson -- Michael Jackson accepts his award -- Kid Rock inducts Aerosmith -- Aerosmith accept their award -- Sweet emotion (Aerosmith with Kid Rock).
